TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IXmlJsonWriterInitializer

summary.span: 指定在重用 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON) 编写器向特定输出流写入数据时对该编写器进行初始化的接口。

span.span: Specifies the interface for initializing a JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) writer when reusing them to write to a particular output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建的 对象实现了此接口，在创建后，这些对象可立即开始写入 JSON 编码数据。The objects created by the methods implement this interface and when created are immediately ready to write JSON-encoded data. 但是，如果用户要重用相同的 对象将新 JSON 文档写入另一个输出流，则必须使用 方法将编写器初始化为相应的流。But if a user wants to reuse the same object to write a new JSON document to another output stream, then the writer must be initialized to the appropriate stream by using the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetOutput (System.IO.Stream stream, System.Text.Encoding encoding, bool ownsStream);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetOutput(class System.IO.Stream stream, class System.Text.Encoding encoding, bool ownsStream) cil managed
public: void SetOutput(System::IO::Stream ^ stream, System::Text::Encoding ^ encoding, bool ownsStream);

param.name: stream
param.span: 编写器将写入到的输出 。

span.span: The output to which the writer writes.

param.name: encoding
param.span: 指定输出流字符编码的 。

span.span: The that specifies the character encoding of the output stream.

param.name: ownsStream
param.span: 如果为 ，则在完成时写入器关闭输出流；否则为 。

span.span: If , the output stream is closed by the writer when done; otherwise .

summary.span: 使用指定的字符编码将 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON) 编写器初始化（或重新初始化）为指定的输出流。

span.span: Initializes (or reinitializes) a JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) writer to a specified output stream with specified character encoding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建的 对象实现了此接口，在创建后，这些对象可立即开始写入 JSON 编码数据。The objects created by the methods implement this interface and when created are immediately ready to write JSON-encoded data. 但是，如果用户要重用相同的 对象将新 JSON 文档写入另一个输出流，则必须使用 方法将编写器初始化为相应的流。But if a user wants to reuse the same object to write a new JSON document to another output stream, then the writer must be initialized to the appropriate stream by using the method. 创建的编写器可以处理 UTF-8 和 UTF-16（Little-Endian 或 Big-Endian）编码。The writers created by can handle the UTF-8 and the UTF-16 (big- or little-endian) encodings.
